features: 1【STEAMER FOR CLOTHES】 The Steamer is very efficient and did a great job getting the wrinkles out. It can also be used at home and has a nice 8-foot long power cord that gives it easy reach to just about any home electrical outlet. helping you stay elegant and tidy, anytime and anywhere.

2【EASY TO USE】 The garment steamer heats up in less than 40 seconds to produce intense steam .The water tank can hold up to 150ml, which can provide full steam and remove stubborn wrinkles for about 10 minutes, saving you time.
3【PORTABLE & COMPACT】 It is lightweight . The garment steamer is only 1.2lb in weight. It has a compact size . So it can easily be taken on extended trips without a whole lot of hassle.

4【 REMOVE WRINKLES EASILY】The garment steamer allows powerful steam to flow efficiently and refresh fabrics quickly. The steamer is suitable for almost fabrics, such as cotton, linen, silk, polyester, wool, velvet, and other common blended fabrics.

5【DESIGN FOR TRAVEL】 It is designed for travel and home! No matter you are staying at a hotel or going on a road trip, this mini steamer perfectly fits for any traveler! Its compact size makes it possible to fit in any suitcase, bag or a backpack. You don't have to worry about wrinkled clothes while travel on the road!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Steam Output The portable clothes steamer is light, comfortable with its ergonomic design. Its small hand-held design makes it very easy to store when not in use and a fantastic travel steamer.
Suitable for Most Fabrics This portable steamer is very suitable for ironing various fabrics, including cotton, silk, wool, etc., without damaging your clothes.
How to Use Effortlessly de-wrinkle and refresh delicate clothes . The handheld garment steamer heats up in 40 seconds. Detachable water tank makes it easy to refill anytime.
Easy to Use The travel steamer is easy to use.Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V .

The Best Gift for Family and Friends The travel steamer is the best gift for family and friends . The portable steamer is lightweight and small.This is Perfect handheld steamer for traveling or having limited space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful given the size
reviews.reviewText: This travel handheld steamer is unbelievably powerful given it's size. It has a nice 8-foot long power cord, heats up in less than a minute and produces a lot of steam .The water tank is not that big but given the size of the steamer it's okay. The steamer is pretty lightweight and it's compact in size making it great for use when travelling or at home as it will ot take much space. The quality is really good and the performance is even better. I was totally ready to be disappointed (I've purchased others before) and instead I was pleasantly surprised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need it in a pinch
reviews.reviewText: It's quick and easy and price was great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome, great small size and is powerful. I e never had it spit or blow up on my clothes. It’s just works perfectly and is the right size for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little steamer
reviews.reviewText: I got this primarily for getting the wrinkles out of suit jackets and for some satin garnets. It works great. I had to refill it about three quarts of the way through steaming the suit jacket, but given its small size, I can’t fault it for having a small water capacity. I’m not sure if I would recommend it for traveling if you’re flying, as it does still take up a bit of room, but for traveling by car or something, it would be perfect. Highly recommend. It works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little device
reviews.reviewText: This steamer works super well! It heats up really fast and works great. The only thing I'd say is to only use it on small projects. We were steaming a small cloth and it did run out of water quickly because it's so small. I wouldn't steam a wedding dress with this, for example. But it's great to have around the house for a quick steam before you leave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the steam is weak, and the capacity is too small. I debated whether to get a refund but decided to just use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly sufficient steamer!
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is perfectly sufficient. It is corded (as it says) so make sure that you have a place to hang your clothes near an outlet. It heats up quickly and is ready to go. It is quite handy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long cord, don't tip it over.
reviews.reviewText: The long cord makes it convenient to use. It takes about a minute for the water to start boiling. I recommend not filling it full, as half a tank of water boils faster. Also try to keep the steamer vertical. If you tip it close to 90 degrees the boiling water will spill out.
